mapper.select: select notice_subject, notice_content, notice_idx from notice where notice_idx = #{notice_idx}
mapper.update: update notice set notice_subject=#{notice_subject}, notice_content=#{notice_content} where notice_idx = #{notice_idx}
mapper.select: select review_idx, review_content, review_email, p.product_name as "product_name" from review r join product p on r.review_product_idx = p.product_idx
mapper.update: update coupon set coupon_status = 0 where coupon_idx = #{coupon_idx}
update coupon set coupon_status = 1 where coupon_idx = #{coupon_idx}
mapper.insert: insert into coupon (coupon_idx, coupon_name, coupon_price, coupon_status, coupon_date, coupon_expire) values (#{coupon_idx}, #{coupon_name}, #{coupon_price}, 1, #{coupon_date}, #{coupon_expire})
mapper.update: update coupon set coupon_status = 1 where coupon_idx in ( select * from (select coupon_idx from coupon) as a);
update coupon set coupon_status = 0 where coupon_idx in ( select * from (select coupon_idx from coupon where curdate() > coupon_expire) as a);
